title: UPDATE: Mikel Landa Returns to Spain after Breaking Back in Giro d’Italia Stage 1
content:
The multi-time Giro stage winner was hit by bad luck on opening day as other GC hopefuls remained upright but lost time.

Read the full article at UPDATE: Mikel Landa Returns to Spain after Breaking Back in Giro d’Italia Stage 1 on Velo.
author: sstokes
